about_the_game:
ZombieCards draws inspiration from Exploding Kittens and Escape from Tarkov, innovatively combining intense card battles with post-apocalyptic survival. Engage in card duels based on Russian Roulette rules, scavenge supplies, make timely escapes, and build your camp as you fight for your final chance at survival in the zombie-infested city of Travis!

Strategic Urban Adventures

Every decision is a matter of life and death! Only by emerging as the ultimate survivor in each battle can you claim all the loots. Choose your enemies wisely, recruit survivors, acquire powerful weapons, and expand your card deck to pave your way to victory!

Thrilling Underground Challenges

Double or nothing — enter the corporation’s underground arena for heart-pounding challenges where survival hinges on your every move.

Smoke-Filled Frontline Battles

Choose your faction and fight alongside allies on the frontlines. Your enemies are not only the relentless zombie hordes but also rival human combatants who are even more merciless.

More Features

  • High Playability: Over 90 playable characters and 100+ collectible loots, each character with unique skills and traits.

  • Camp Building: Use scavenged materials and loots to build facilities in your camp, increasing your survival odds. (beware of shady black market merchants!)

  • Multiplayer Mode: Supports up to 6 players in online mode, allowing you and your friends to experience the thrill of betrayal and survival together.

  • Apocalyptic Narratives: Unravel the conspiracies and power struggles among three superpowers in Travis. Your choices will determine the outcome of diverse story endings.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support

short_description: ZombieCards is a card-based post-apocalyptic game inspired by Russian Roulette. Set in the zombie-infested city of Travis, embark on a crazy adventure where card battles are key to scavenging supplies, building camp, and outwitting other survivors. Survival is your sole purpose!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
